name: Perditus Chi
description:
You've crash landed onto Perditus Chi!

Explore this mysterious planet with your trusty grappling hook and hopefully find enough fuel to get the heck out...

Controls:

     WASD - Movement

     Space - Jump

     Left Click - Fire grappling hook

Credits:

ProgrammerAndy BaeArtistJack PressnellComposer/Play testerVincenti Zghra

Made as a part of:

Weekly Game Jam 129 - Lost in Space
